Key Match Events: The Cubs recorded only one hit — a Cody Bellinger double in the fourth inning — in the shutout.
Pre-Game Insights: Yankees first baseman Anthony Rizzo was welcomed back to Wrigley Field before a game against the Cubs on Sept. 6, 2024.
Post-Match Reflections: Fans cheered for Yankees first baseman Anthony Rizzo in his return to Wrigley Field for a game against the Cubs on Sept. 6, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sarah Zematis and her daughter Sophia, 12, attended a game between the Yankees and the Cubs at Wrigley Field courtesy of the Anthony Rizzo Family Foundation on Sept. 6, 2024.
Others: Cubs left fielder Ian Happ holds his right forearm while heading to the dugout after striking out against the Yankees in the eighth inning on Sept. 6, 2024, at Wrigley Field.
